Comments_List: As this was my first political science/history course, the biggest thing I gained was a political lens through which to analyze history.

Try to challenge the students to ask more pointed questions regarding the reading/material. Perhaps we can submit a list of questions in advance of the class. Overall though, this class was excellent.
I would definitely recommend this course to other students, who are interested in learning about Turkish politics.
